Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Details Approximately one month before I saw a bright light go past my backyard window and in my kitchen. I grabbed my camera and recorded what looks to be two dark gray creatures in my kitchen. Then went out back and filmed two different UFO,s. After examining the tape I was freaked did not want to believe what I saw. And still my biggest question is why me! So last Saturday I went back outside with my camera and captured three different type crafts. The first is a futuristic looking plane it would fly within 10 feet of me. the second was a ring looking craft with a single bright light moving fast and go to a sudden halt looked to be starring me down,then a disk "saucer" shaped shot from the right to the left faster than a speeding bullet. It sounded similar to a fighter jet, which I have also recorded. I would appreciate contact by phone, not e-mail. I would really like a response ASAP and Thank You for your time.

Summary: I saw three different types of UFO,s I have them all on video.
